turkish_example_sentence: Biz yeni açılan modern sergiyi müzede görmüş olsaydık sanat hakkında konuşurduk
english_example_sentence: If we had seen the newly opened modern exhibition at the museum, we would have talked about art
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы видели недавно открытую современную выставку в музее, мы бы говорили об искусстве
